inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: proteinuria or micro/macro-albuminuria and impaired GFR by MDRD equation

inclusion.criterion: Minimal cognitive function for a diabetes self management
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Serum Creatinine > 4.0 mg/dl and/or an estimated GFR of < 15 ml/min
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis, but meets inclusion criteria for Type 2 Diabetes mellitus. He does not have serum creatinine > 4.0 mg/dl or an estimated GFR of < 15 ml/min.
